何の役にも立たない: (なんのやくにもたたない) - of no use whatsoever; good for nothing; useless
何の某: (なんのなにがし) - certain person; certain amount
何の様: (どのよう) - what sort; what kind
何の様に: (どのように) - how; in what way
何の気なし: (なんのきなし) - unintentional; with calmness; casually
何の気無し: (なんのきなし) - unintentional; with calmness; casually
何の辺: (どのへん) - whereabout/about where; how much
何の道: (どのみち) - anyway; anyhow; at any rate; in any case
何の顔あって: (なんのかんばせあって) - How could I (you, etc.) ...?; How dare you (they, etc.) (have the nerve to) ...?
何はさておき: (なにはさておき) - before anything else; first of all
何はともあれ: (なにはともあれ) - at any rate; in any case; at the very least; if nothing else
何はなくとも: (なにはなくとも) - even if nothing else; more than anything else
何は扨措き: (なにはさておき) - before anything else; first of all
何は無くとも: (なにはなくとも) - even if nothing else; more than anything else
何ひとつ: (なにひとつ) - (not) one (usu. in neg. phrases)
何びと: (なんびと) - everyone; every person; all; anyone
何ぶん: (なにぶん) - some/any/(a) little/of some kind/of some sort; please; anyway/anyhow/at any rate/after all
何べん: (なんべん) - how many times; how often
何ぼ: (なんぼ) - how/how much/how many/how long/how far; under no circumstances/whatever the circumstances may be/say what you like; being meaningful/being significant/having value/having worth
何ぼう: (なんぼう) - (old form of 何ぼ)  how/how much/how many/how long/how far; under no circumstances/whatever the circumstances may be/say what you like; being meaningful/being significant/having value/having worth
何も: (なにも) - nothing (with neg. verbs)/not any; and everything else (with noun plus "mo")/all
何もかも: (なにもかも) - anything and everything; just about everything
何も彼も: (なにもかも) - anything and everything; just about everything
何やかやで: (なにやかやで) - all told; what with one thing and another
何やら: (なにやら) - something; for some reason; some kind of
何やら彼にやら: (なにやらかにやら) - this and that
何や彼や: (なにやかや) - this and that; one thing or another
何より: (naniyori) - acima de tudo; mais que qualquer coisa; melhor, ótimo, excelente, maravilhoso, mais importante
何よりも: (なんよりも) - more than anything; above all else
何ら: (なにら) - whatever/what/what sort of/any kind of; nothing whatever (with neg. verb)
何らか: (なんらか) - some; any; in any way; of some kind; of some sort
何れ: (いづれ) - where/which/who; anyway/anyhow/at any rate/sooner or later/eventually/at some future date or time
何れか: (いずれか) - any of; either of; (to) any
何れくらい: (どれくらい) - how long; how far; how much
何れぐらい: (どれぐらい) - how long; how far; how much
何れにしても: (いずれにしても) - anyhow; at all events; in any case; either way; anyway
何れにせよ: (いずれにせよ) - at any rate; in any event; either way; anyway
何れの場合においても: (いずれのばあいにおいても) - in either case; in all cases
何れまた: (いずれまた) - some other time; another time
何れも: (いずれも) - both; either; any; all; every; none (with neg. verb)
何れも此れも: (どれもこれも) - each and every; all
何れ何れ: (どれどれ) - which (emphatic); let me see/well now
何をかくそう: (なにをかくそう) - to be frank with you; to tell you the truth; I'm going to lay my cards on the table
何をか言わんや: (なにをかいわんや) - what more can one say?; to be utterly at a loss for words (because of disbelief or disgust)
何を言うてんねん: (なにをいうてんねん) - what the hell are you saying?
何を言うとんねん: (なにをいうとんねん) - what the hell are you saying?
何を言ってんねん: (なにをいってんねん) - what the hell are you saying?
何を隠そう: (なにをかくそう) - to be frank with you; to tell you the truth; I'm going to lay my cards on the table
何ヶ月: (なんかげつ) - how many months?; how long?
何一つ: (なにひとつ) - (not) one (usu. in neg. phrases)
何万年: (なんまんねん) - tens of thousands of years
何事: (なにごと) - what/something/everything; nothing (with neg. verb); something or other/unspecified matter
何事も: (なにごとも) - anything/whatever; nothing (with neg. verb)
何事もなかったかのように: (なにごともなかったかのように) - as if nothing had happened
何事もなく: (なにごともなく) - uneventfully; without incident; without a hitch; peacefully
何人: (なんぴと) - everyone; every person; all; anyone
何人たりとも: (なんびとたりとも) - no one at all; no one, who he or she may be
何人でも: (なんにんでも) - any number of people
何人も: (なんぴとも) - everyone; all; nobody (with negative verb)
何人様: (なんびとさま) - how many people
何代目: (なんだいめ) - what ordinal number (of a president)
何何: (なになに) - such and such (when being vague, placeholder, etc.)/this and that; What?/What is the matter?/What are the items?
何処: (doko) - where, what place; how much (longo, distante), what extent
何処か: (どっか) - somewhere; anywhere; in some respects
何処かしら: (どこかしら) - in some way/somehow or other; somewhere or other
何処となく: (どことなく) - somehow; for some reason; vaguely
何処と無く: (どことなく) - somehow; for some reason; vaguely
何処にでも: (どこにでも) - (何処でも with に)  anywhere
何処にも: (どこにも) - nowhere (with neg. verb)/not anywhere; everywhere/anywhere/anyplace
何処にも彼処にも: (どこにもかしこにも) - all over; everywhere
何処へも: (どこへも) - nowhere; not anywhere (with neg. verb)
何処まで: (どこまで) - how far; to what extent
何処までも: (どこまでも) - anywhere/for all time/to the ends of the earth; through thick and thin/come hell or high water/to the bitter end/to the utmost; persistently/stubbornly; in all respects/on every point; thoroughly/exhaustively
何処も彼処も: (どこもかしこも) - all over; all over the place; everywhere
何処吹く風: (どこふくかぜ) - something that doesn't concern one at all
何処迄: (どこまで) - how far; to what extent
何処迄も: (どこまでも) - anywhere/for all time/to the ends of the earth; through thick and thin/come hell or high water/to the bitter end/to the utmost; persistently/stubbornly; in all respects/on every point; thoroughly/exhaustively
何分: (なにぶん) - some/any/(a) little/of some kind/of some sort; please; anyway/anyhow/at any rate/after all
